snippet.title: Level Zero: Extraction - Open Beta Gameplay Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description: The Open Beta of the upcoming multiplayer extraction horror Level Zero: Extraction is now available on Steam. Watch the new gameplay trailer and get the first look at the variety of weapons and survival mechanics in this high-stakes tactical PvP horror where mercenaries compete with each other for valuable loot while trying to fight against player-controlled alien monsters that can only be killed with light. Level Zero: Extraction is coming to Steam Early Access in 2024.
